titleStmt.title: The three kingdomes case: or, Their sad calamities, together with their causes and cure. Laid down in a sermon preached at a publique fast at Kingston upon Hull. With some very remarkable passages of providence worthy of generall observation. /
titleStmt.author: Shawe, John, 1608-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B. for John Bartlet, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the gilt Cup, under Saint Austins Gate.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the gilt Cup, under Saint Austins Gate.
